name: festering_desire

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 16% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 6%.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 20% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 7.5%.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 24% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 9%.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 28% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 10.5%.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 32% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 12%.

description: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with a shriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.
